title: Can I change the color of Dragon lee sin skin?

replies.body:
Dragon Fist Lee Sin does have some chromas which would let you have different colors on the skin, but you'll need to buy the chroma you want first. Hit up the client store, click skins towards the top, and search for lee sin with the chroma box checked and you can find them there. I even included a little picture for reference ^_^!
